body.name: 6 Piece Stainless Steel Kids Silverware Set - Child and Toddler Safe Flatware - Kids Utensil Set - Metal Kids Cutlery Set (Includes 3 Small Kids Spoons & Kids 3 Forks)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 29 mins
features: Children Cutlery Set for Every Meal - This set has 6 pieces, that designed especially for small children. It comes with 3 kids Forks (size: 5.75" x 1"), 3 kids Spoons (size: 5.6" x 1.25") that are designed to look like adult silverware, but with smaller and safer dimensions for your child's mouth and fingers. Your kids will love feeling like grown-ups with these fun and shiny utensils!

Child Friendly - Each kids silverware set is sized for your child’s little mouth and fingers. Ergonomic handles with smooth edges for children's safety use - easy to hold for a child’s hand, forks with rounded tines which is important for the safety of children's independent eating, suitable for all ages and genders; juniors, toddlers, preschoolers, and school age children.

Safe Material - This metal kids utensils set is made of premium stainless steel 430 (18/0) that is mirror polished and nickel-free. It is rustproof and safe for your child's health. It is also easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

Fun Design - Introduce your kids to the fun of fruits with these cutlery sets that feature apple and strawberry shapes. The spoons and forks have engravings of these fruits that make them look realistic and attractive. These kids fork spoon set encourages children to eat and helps them develop their self-feeding skills more easily. It's a great way to make your table livelier and more enjoyable!

Ideal for Indoor & Outdoor Use - Prefect for kid's birthday parties, Christmas, holidays meals, and any other special event. Great for kindergartens, schools and daycare centers, summer camp, picnics, restaurants and more. Each kids metal silverware set comes with a stylish box and lifetime guarantee for a complete package. Treat your kids to these safe & cute children's silverware set today! They will love them!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CHILDREN CUTLERY SET FOR EVERY MEAL Are you having a difficult time finding a safe and perfectly sized utensil for your child to use? Your little one is getting bigger, and it's time he or she starts learning how to use flatware like an adult. However, Adult utensils are more complicated to use, and what your child needs is a starter set that is just right for him or her. With CHILLOUT LIFE Utensil Set for Kids, you can be sure that your little one will have an easy time enjoying his or her meal! Let your children feel how it is like to be a grownup by giving them their first set of adult-like flatware. Each utensil is small enough to fit your young one’s tiny mouth and fingers. Easy to grip and safe to use, the set comes with forks that have rounded tines, and knives that have non-serrated blades.
Kids Will Be Excited to Have Silverware Like Adults but That Are Their Size and Safe Comfortable and Easy to Hold Forks With Rounded Tines Dishwasher Safe & Extremely Durable

Children's Safe Flatware Set Ideal for all genders, this kids cutlery set stainless steel comes with adorable engraved fruits designs for boys and girls of all ages. The apple, grapes & strawberry will make mealtime more exciting! They can be used in school, at picnics & other places. Perfect for gifting, this kids flatware set comes with a gift box so that you can buy it for your relatives as well as your friend’s kids. It is great for giving on birthdays, Christmas & much more! Still not convinced? Here are more reasons to love CHILLOUT LIFE Utensil Set: + Tested in trusted labs (BPA, phthalate, lead & toxin free) + Free from toxic & hazardous substances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for young children
reviews.reviewText: These are great for age 3 and up. They’re well made, very smooth, and have a bit of weight to them. They are too big for toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are cute and sturdy. Been washing them for a while, no rust. Perfect for littles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are durable, cute, and perfect size for small toddler hands. My daughter is 4 and loves them. And they are strong stainless steel. Great buy, worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddler hands
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. Bought 2nd set because grandchildren love using them. The colors are very nice and perfect size for toddlers, ages 4 1/2 & 2 1/2. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Actually useful for my four year old that eats cereal like it’s the only food on earth… Forks are nice because they’re not sharp but they still push through the food he’s trying to eat. Perfect size for their little hands. And haven’t had any issues with the colors fading or anything like that. They’re nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my daughter and she loves them. Small enough she can handle but big enough she fells like a big girl

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Far so good
reviews.reviewText: Utensils are holding up well and have been run on the dishwasher a few times now. So far so good. They are still rarely new when giving this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for meal prep containers
reviews.reviewText: We meal prep a lot. We bought some awesome glass containers but none of our cutlery fit and we hated wasting plastic utensils or handwashing our cutlery at work. These fit perfectly in the glass containers and go straight into the dishwasher to clean when we get home.Also they'll be the perfect size for our little to use when she starts solids and can hold utensils.
We love them! It’s the perfect size for my 18 months old toddler, and it’s easy to grab food with the fork compared to plastic forks.

It is what it says they are stainless steel, cute little cutlery set. Very good quality for the money spent and the little fruit embellishments on the ends are a nice touch , my girls ( age 2 and 4) really like them and pick them over their plastic ones now... the spoons are a little shallow so for soups they still want to use the deeper plastic ones but other then that they are perfect .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These actually fit in our dishwasher - now buying an extra set to take up to our daughter's grandparents to leave there. Perfect next step for toddlers.

reviews.reviewTitle: maneggevoli, durevoli, funzionali e pratiche. La mia bimbe le adora
reviews.reviewText: maneggevoli, durevoli, funzionali e pratiche. La mia bimbe le adora

The quality and size of this set is perfect for your toddler who thinks they are “too big” for baby/kids cutlery. The spoon is wide and relatively deep so it’s great for kids to scoop a descent mouthful of their cereal or rice without it all falling off. The width of the handle encourages our kids to eat for themselves but also reasonably sized for us to pick them up and help them scoop or stab their food.
